name: Time Savers
description:
Time Savers is an first person platformer focused on speed running.  You have a very limited time, but you can pick up hour glasses to get more time.  Once you run out of time, you will rewind back to the start of the level.  Make sure you explore your environment to plan out your future runs.  

How much time can you save?

This was made in 24 hours by Arren De Manuel, for VGDC's Winter Game Jam 2020.  The theme was Time.
